attributes.action: Stop all green taxes global warming is happening has always happened and will continue to happen (It will get worse as the 3rd world goes through there industrial revolution) Investment should be aimed at solutions to survive the effects of global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Green taxes are a joke, it squeezes the common man who is at the very bottom of the worlds carbon foot print.Motor companies can produce cars that run on liquid hydrogen by product water or electric why are these not on the market? Global warming will continue it has always been here lets look at solutions to survive its effects and force these new technologies through, not punish the common man the least of all contributors.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
